= HQDM_member_of_kind

//Include information from owl files

The following model provides an overview of :HQDM_member_of_kind

image::./images/{diagram_x}.png[alternative text]

include::xx_yy_zz.adoc[]

|===
|Element |Description

|Type
|owl:ObjectProperty

|Name
|HQDM_member_of_kind

|IRI
|http://ontology.asam.net/ontologies/OpenXOntologyHQDM.owl#HQDM_member_of_kind

|Comment
|A member_of relationship type where each defined_relationship is a member_of exactly one kind_of_relationship_with_signature.

Note: member_of_kind is only for assigning kinds (sets of things that have common characteristics = concepts in ISO704) to  things (including relationships, so not just spatio-temporal extents)

|===
